name: Rextofos Theorem
description:
The game is like a dream. Your soul goes somewhere and becomes someone you don’t know. Which path are you going to take? It all depends on you.

 The game has a mysterious theme with simple gameplay. It features:

  • Mysterious cave and demons:
  • Original low-poly art: The game art is originally designed and beautifully rendered by Unity Universal Rendering Pipeline. 
  • High quality music and sound effects: Music and sound effects are carefully chosen to fit the game theme.
  • Modern vector-based UI design with easy-to-follow game guides: UI is designed around the main components of the game, and provides you with enough game information in order to progress. Game guides are displayed and/or hinted as the game progresses to show you helpful messages at different points in the game.
  • Simple gameplay with mouse control: Player character can be controlled using only a mouse (left-click to move and right-click to attack). 

It took about a week to develop this game for Secret Santa Jam 2022.
